markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vicious Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4037) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 63

**Prerequisites**
[Envenom](/Actions.aspx?ID=1451)

</column>

---

The venom you produce is exceptionally potent and difficult to overcome. Your vishkanyan venom gains the [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) trait, requiring two consecutive saves to reduce the venom's stage by 1. A critical success reduces your venom's stage by only 1 instead of by 2.
name: Vicious Venom
